data.actual_result: Typing cursor starts off small for a split second and then resizes to the proper size
data.short_description: Typing cursor resizes after tapping the kick/ban reason field the first time after opening the kick/ban page
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can kick/ban members - Open the kick/ban page - Tap on the reason field - Observe the typing cursor right as you tap on the field - If you don't notice anything, close the page and try again - Note: This happens immediately after tapping the field, so you have to be watching the field closely before and as you tap on it
